file.name: MeteoIO-2.9.0-x86_64.tar.gz
file.description: Binary package for MeteoIO compiled for i686, 64 bits. Compiled on Ubuntu 18.04. Please consider using Inishell to configure your data pre-processing!

file.name: MeteoIO-2.9.0-x86_64.deb
file.description: DEB binary package for MeteoIO compiled for i686, 64 bits. Compiled on Ubuntu 18.04. Please consider using Inishell to configure your data pre-processing!

file.name: MeteoIO-2.9.0-x86_64.rpm
file.description: RPM binary package for MeteoIO compiled for i686, 64 bits. Compiled on Ubuntu 18.04. Please consider using Inishell to configure your data pre-processing!

file.name: MeteoIO-2.9.0-x86_64.dmg
file.description: Binary package for MeteoIO compiled on Mac OsX. Compiled with XCode on Intel. Please consider using Inishell to configure your data pre-processing!

file.name: MeteoIO-2.9.0-x86_64.exe
file.description: Binary package for MeteoIO compiled for 64 bits (gcc8.1). Please consider using Inishell to configure your data pre-processing!

file.name: MeteoIO-2.9.0-src.tar.gz
file.description: Please have a look at Getting-started for instructions (the build is based on cmake). Please consider using Inishell to configure your data pre-processing!
